body_html:
Thanks - it seems this solves it.

--Hannes

On Tue, Aug 16, 2016 at 1:05 PM, Derek Murray notifications@github.com
wrote:

Can you try adding the following line, before starting the queue runners:

sess.run(tf.initialize_local_variables())`

(It looks like there was a breaking change between 0.9 and 0.10, which
recast how the auxiliary variables inside functions like
tf.train.input_producer() are initialized.)

—
